website_summaries.verdict: This gluten-free snack bar is also packed with vitamins.
pros: Very tasty fair trade granola bars
Company makes several flavors of the product
The company also gives a portion of its profits from sales to help feed the hungry

customer_reviews.title: These are amazing! Seriously :)
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these on prime day just to try them out. I figured if they were terrible at least they feed starving children. To my surprise these things were seriously yummy... like the best tasting bars I've had kind of yummy. Wish I had known about this company sooner, totally hooked now.
customer_reviews.author: Jole R.

customer_reviews.title: Not the same ingredients as shown listed, tons of sweetners and oils added to the new recipe
customer_reviews.text: The ingredients listed are not at all what I recieved. I loved these bars no sugar and no canola oil simple ingredients, now they don’t taste good. They also add cane sugar, brown rice syrup, canola oil, and a bunch of more ingredients which have changed. The product lists the old version which is what I was hoping to recieve when I ordered a case. Misleading thinking I’m getting a healthy honey sweetened treat when they add sugar and glucose now. Gross. Such a let down, I had already subscribed to them months and will have to cancel now. I hope the company will refund me. Update** I reached out to company Nov 13 2 days ago still not heardback
customer_reviews.author: anonymous72818

customer_reviews.title: Smiling
customer_reviews.text: When I got a little hungry today and reached for this snack bar, I started reading the package. As I ate this very delicious flaver combo, I noticed it's Fair Trade ( good), Gluten Free (good), Non GMO, (good), Dairy Free (good), has size friendly almonds (good) and then I read the "We Eat Together " slogan on the package (INCREDIBLE! !!). It immediately reminded me why I originally purchased "THIS BAR SAVES LIVES" ...... for that exact reason. ... knowing I'm giving a meal to a hungry child in addition to enjoying a healthy snack. Somehow it made me smile a bit bigger .
customer_reviews.author: kris

customer_reviews.title: These Bars Taste Great!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, these are all delicious. Vanilla is definitely my favorite flavor followed the dark chocolate peanut butter. The fruit flavored ones are also excellent. I was honestly surprised just how good these were and I'd be happy eat any flavor. Saving lives is just a nice bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Bumblebug

customer_reviews.title: Great taste!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the peanut butter bar, but it’s the only one I’ve tried so far. You may wonder why I only gave it 4 stars then. It’s because one of the ingredients is palm kernel oil. I would think that they would you something healthier and better for the planet than this. Update: I messaged the company regarding their use of palm kernel oil and received no answer. Lowering to 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Sweetsoap

customer_reviews.title: Wait until you try one of these!
customer_reviews.text: So you think you know granola bars! Not these. Exceptional chocolate on the chocolate ones and great berries and nuts in the others. Talk about a treat! Plus you're helping feed starving children. Well worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Jupiter Reader

customer_reviews.title: These are absolutely perfect for when I'm craving something sweet
customer_reviews.text: I have recently given up gluten, soy and dairy as well as sugar but I'm being a little more lenient with that as I begin to adjust. These are absolutely perfect for when I'm craving something sweet! They taste delicious, much better than other things I have tried. Just note that it is manufactured in a facility that contains peanuts, tree nuts, milk, wheat, eggs and soy. I'm not allergic to those ingredients, so I'm okay eating them but for anyone who has actual allergies may not want to try.
customer_reviews.author: Allie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These bars are amazing but Target has them for alot cheaper!!!
customer_reviews.author: Devil

customer_reviews.title: This Bar Saves Lives, Variety Pack
customer_reviews.text: These bars are great. Taste is very good. Real Food. I rated a little lower only because they can fall apart when eating. And a little sticky. Would not be good to eat on the run, say in a car or while hiking. If stopped while hiking, then yes. I like that my purchase helps buy food for children. And I will purchase again. Just better for a snack at home.
customer_reviews.author: SWA_superdisp

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I've been eating these bars for some time now. My wife likes the Chewy bar with the dark chocolate and peanuts in it, I like the Madagascar Almond. I like the theme of the company and I like the content of the bars. I use these bars to help get more fiber, the right fats, and minerals. I have at least one nut bar a day. So far I have no heart problem, no blood pressure problems, no diabetes, no med problems. I attribute a much of that to eating a lot of nuts (almonds, pecan, cashes, pistachios) of which these bars are one key part. Easy to grab and eat. What else can I say?
customer_reviews.author: Georgie

customer_reviews.title: THE best tasting bars!!
customer_reviews.text: I originally received the Wild Blueberry Pistachio bar on a First Class flight on Delta. It was delicious. The flavor of this bar is wonderful! The overlying flavor is blueberry, but the nut, seeds, rice and oats balance out the sweetness of the berries perfectly. This is now my go-to travel and purse snack for the times that hunger hits between meals. Yum! I since ordered this 4-pack of flavors. They are all delicious! And they come in the best box of wrapped up goodness. I'm hooked.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: OOOO So Good!!
customer_reviews.text: These are an adventure in eating, I kind of peel away the wrapper and eat it from the wrapper without actually touching it, this is my fav bar! I happened to get one of these bars on a overseas flight I took a few months ago and when I found them on Amazon I was thrilled..... I get to eat something yummy and healthy and do good at the same time, total win win.
customer_reviews.author: agnome

customer_reviews.title: Just subscribed monthly!!!
customer_reviews.text: These bars are my new favorite! I love the texture...I was afraid they would be hard, but they are instead s nice balance between crunchy and chewy. This flavor (choc/peanut butter) are delicious. I just subscribed to get 2 boxes per month!
customer_reviews.author: lorafina

customer_reviews.title: A gift for those you love and a life saving gift for those in need.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these bars as surprise gifts for my 4 grandchildren. I also ordered them because of the extra donation of life saving food for those suffering from hunger. My grandchildren loved the bars so I ordered more for them. They arrived quickly. These are good and healthy and serve two good causes. A healthy gift for my grandchildren and a gift of life saving food for those in need.
customer_reviews.author: S. Epling

customer_reviews.title: Beat up box
customer_reviews.text: The bar was tasty but I doubt I'll order again. The box containing the bars was beat up and taped up. Very unattractive. It looked like they had either been returned or someone had grabbed an old box and stuffed some other bars into it. Seller, I suggest you take more care with your presentation. It truly does effect sales. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Leonard Blush ~ tenor virtuoso

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Granola Bar
customer_reviews.text: Probably the best granola bar I've had. Can really taste the vanilla and honey. I don't like salty sweets, and I can taste a hint of salt, but not too much to overpower it or keep from enjoying it. Originally had this on a Delta flight, and it was so good, I bought some for home!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff T

customer_reviews.title: Great Granola bar!
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered these granola bars many times. I like the chocolate and peanut butter combination. On another note I'm happy I received the correct shipment because the last 2 orders I received: Madagascar Vanilla Almond & Honey and Wild Blueberry & Pistachio which is not what I ordered. I didn't return them or complain because the proceeds are for a good cause. They were good but I prefer the Dark Chocolate & Peanut Butter bars.
customer_reviews.author: Jamal M.

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: This was my first time trying these bars. Absolutely amazing. They had flavor, and they are natural. I have tried a lot of bars but this was really good. My favorite out the box is the Blueberry and pistachio and PBJ. I’m going to order some more. And they’re gluten free and calories don’t kill my diet.
customer_reviews.author: dracc

customer_reviews.title: My favorite bars
customer_reviews.text: I initially bought the bars because of the business model. I continue to buy them because they’re so dang good. I sent a box to my daughter and the bars are now her favorite. And kudos to Amazon. They sent the wrong flavor last time and quickly rectified it. I reordered and received the correct flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Tutu Sue

customer_reviews.title: Delicious, healthful, and not in the least boring!
customer_reviews.text: These bars rule! Excellent flavors. Good combination of interesting ingredients. Not boring. I appreciated the lower glycemic index relative to some of the other competing brands.
customer_reviews.author: Interested Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Great Snack
customer_reviews.text: I really like these bars. Sometimes granola bars can be too sweet or, on the other end, kind of flavorless but these ones land in the middle. These are great snacks on the go and, very importantly, don't crumble into a mess of crumbs when you're trying to eat them.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Delicious without too much "junk" in them
customer_reviews.text: We love love love these bars and basically order a box of them every week. The Dark Chocolate Cherry flavor is by far my favorite of these! The ingredients have low added sugar and no weird chemicals which is unlike most granola bars. These are perfect for throwing in my backpack for work but they do get a little melty if exposed to any heat.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy F.

customer_reviews.title: It would be great if only they would send me what I ordered
customer_reviews.text: WONDERFUL snack with the side benefit of giving back BUT I ordered the vanilla bars and keep getting the blueberry...no way to contact anyone about the issue.
customer_reviews.author: GRT

customer_reviews.title: overpriced for the 12-pack
customer_reviews.text: The bars are fine and they taste good. However, the price is too much. Save your money and buy a couple of 12-packs from another brand
customer_reviews.author: Dave D

customer_reviews.title: Flavor Just Average
customer_reviews.text: There is no distinctive flavor from this bar. I expected a strong vanilla flavor, but none whatsoever, the honey nor almond aren't even apparent ; it's just a crunchy, sticky, bar. After having the choc. cherry, this was a disappointment. It's personal preference, but I'll try other flavors, and doubtful I'd buy the vanilla,almond, honey again.
customer_reviews.author: YankeeinSC

customer_reviews.title: Most amazing healthy snack that gives back!!!
customer_reviews.text: Most amazing bar ever!! They taste like a delicious candy bar but good for you! They are a great afternoon snack! I really love the fact that by purchasing these bars, it helps feed children who are less fortunate. Kudos to the makers of these bars! What an awesome thing to do!!
customer_reviews.author: hjc

customer_reviews.title: Delicious but Expensive
customer_reviews.text: These are the best tasting snack bar I've ever had but they are pricey. It comes out to almost $2 a bar. They are seriously delicious though so to me it's worth it - just not something I'd buy all the time. They really do taste like a PB&J.
customer_reviews.author: KLW

customer_reviews.title: My favorite bar
customer_reviews.text: In a previous review, I wished this was a Subscribe & Save option. I'm thrilled that it is now! It's on my monthly list and I look forward to it each month. This bar is a great blend of peanut butter, crunch, salt, sweet, and dark chocolate. It's a satisfying snack or dessert.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Delicious, satisfying for breakfast or snack
customer_reviews.text: Delicious, satisfying for breakfast or snack. Flavor rocked. It was in stock and hope it stays that way as other flavors frequently go out of stock. Only issue I have w/ this brand; otherwise, LOVE them.
customer_reviews.author: Ozone Player

customer_reviews.title: i could eat these all day!
customer_reviews.text: instead of the dry, stale nothingness of most granola bars, this one is wet and tasty. The cherries are like you just picked them, not too sweet and not the taste out of a can. The chocolate is melt in your mouth yummy. and everything else compliments the delight that is this "this saves lives"bar.
customer_reviews.author: n mccleary

customer_reviews.title: Great snack bar
customer_reviews.text: Filled with great ingredients with little to no artificial ingredients. Low in sugar but packed with great nutrition. I have sampled most all the flavors and have not found one that isn't great tasting. Amazon prices are the best around.
customer_reviews.author: NH Wifey

customer_reviews.title: Mmmmm
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a kind of splurge item for myself, but man, am I glad that I did. The other reviews are spot-on - this bar is the perfect blend of sweet, savory, crunchy, and chewy. I usually just endure breakfast bars because they're too hard (looking at you, Kind), too mushy (...also looking at you, Kind), or have a weird amalgam of flavors. But this felt like eating dessert more than anything else. Plus, it just feels nice to give back in a small way. Although, I wonder if children in need also have life-threatening allergies like me - in which case, I hope food donations are being made that consist of things other than peanut paste.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Aftertaste
customer_reviews.text: I loved these when they first came out, but the past few boxes I've gotten have a horrible aftertaste. I'm not sure if they changed the ingredients. I won't be buying them again!! :(
customer_reviews.author: Happy from Boston!!

customer_reviews.title: Classic desert combo made nutritious
customer_reviews.text: I'm always looking for different fiber and protein snack bars to bring to work. This is really tasty bar that is equal parts peanut butter and chocolate. Glad to see a good fiber+protein to sugar ratio. I've been subscribed to these for awhile and haven't gotten tired of them quite yet.
customer_reviews.author: Bumblebug

customer_reviews.title: Great Bars With A Cause
customer_reviews.text: These are great bars that benefit you and others. We appreciate the charity behind this product. The price is a little higher, but considering that this bar is bigger than others on the market and the donation that is made the price difference is justifiable. Also, this bar is very high in fiber and there is a flavor for everyone. We will be purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: MUCH PREFERRED THE DARK CHOCOLATE AND SEA SALT
customer_reviews.text: My first time trying these I was able to order Dark Chocolate and sea salt and I really liked the taste. Was excited to buy more however they are sold out online. I decided to give the Chocolate and Coconut a try and while it is still very good the flavor is lacking. Not really sure I am tasting the Coconut in the bar. For the money I am not sure I'd order it again
customer_reviews.author: Mary McLaughlin

customer_reviews.title: Yum yums!!
customer_reviews.text: Enjoyed these very much! Very tasty and glad to have purchased. Quality product!! Received quickly and were shipped well. Not one broken one in the bunch. Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Sherrill Barbary

customer_reviews.title: Delicious, passed the teen taste test.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a nutritious bar for my picky teen daughter. I bought these because the reviews were so great. I agree! These taste amazing and my daughter loved them. I will definitly order again, They are on the chewy side. Also, they are very filling.
customer_reviews.author: DT

customer_reviews.title: Love the bars
customer_reviews.text: I especially like this bar and the blueberry one. These bars have only been available to me at Starbucks previously. What' really good about them is their light, crunchy , seedy texture and nice flavor. My favor bar, preferable to granola bars that I also like or fig bars, which I also like. Worth the money. Wish there were more flavors available.
customer_reviews.author: V. Trow

customer_reviews.title: Great Gluten Free Bar
customer_reviews.text: My son really enjoys this gluten free bar. It is nice to find something that is more nutritious and less additives. I do think they are on the expensive side.
customer_reviews.author: BusyMom

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Snack Bar!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in good shape, well packed. Bars taste great. Seem to be made of excellent ingredients. Not overly sweet. Great for an on the go snack. I highly recommend these bars.
customer_reviews.author: William G. Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Snack Bar
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in good shape, well packed. Bars taste great. Seem to be made of excellent ingredients. Not overly sweet. Great for an on the go snack. I highly recommend these bars.
customer_reviews.author: William G. Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Best things ever
customer_reviews.text: I love these. I’m no chef or connoisseur of any kind, so I can’t give a ton of details. I just know I was given one and I was hooked!
customer_reviews.author: Always looking to mimic life more closely

customer_reviews.title: Good but wrong ingredients listed
customer_reviews.text: I really like these, but the ingredients listed in the description for the vanilla kind are different than the bars you actually receive. The old ingredients are listed, but your receive the updated product, which in my opinion has worse, but still decent, ingredients.There are several differences, and one is they now have “sugar” as an ingredient vs the natural sweeteners in the old one/the one listed in the description. They are still good, but I prefer the old ingredient list.
customer_reviews.author: Lane M.

customer_reviews.title: Chewy! Chunky! Chocolatey!
customer_reviews.text: Their best flavor by far, and I’ve tried them all. Flavors are well-balanced and they don’t skimp on the chocolate chunks. Only wish the bars were a bit larger and the price more reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Angela M

customer_reviews.title: Great snack bars for a good cause!
customer_reviews.text: These bars are great, and the variety pack allows you to try different flavors. The Madagascar vanilla almond and honey is my favorite, but they are all tasty. Great for breakfast on the go or those afternoons when you don't have time for lunch. Will definitely be ordering again.
customer_reviews.author: Elisabeth Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Surely a product with a great social mission would be lacking in taste or quality
customer_reviews.text: When I first heard about this, I had my doubts. Surely a product with a great social mission would be lacking in taste or quality. No way. These are the best bars I've tasted. Madagascar Vanilla is my favorite, followed by the Dark Chocolate and Sea Salt (very close second)!
customer_reviews.author: R. Choi

customer_reviews.title: Yum!!!
customer_reviews.text: These bars are delicious!! I have tried a lot of different bars to eat for a quick breakfast on the go but these are by far my favorite. I want to try another flavor but I love the peanut butter so much I just keep ordering it over and over!
customer_reviews.author: DCD JERSEY GIRL

customer_reviews.title: Excellent taste
customer_reviews.text: I had bought these to put in a snack room but they never made it. I husband loved them. I do think they are pricey and I wouldn't buy them on a regular basis. But I'll get them as a little something different snack.
customer_reviews.author: Jody Varner

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: I have now had all four flavors and I can say these bars taste really good. I don't usually enjoy the bars with fruit but the blue berry pistachio and the dark chocolate cherry are super delicious. The bars can be a little crumbly but that is a testament to their natural ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Delicious with very low carb count
customer_reviews.text: This is the first bar that I have enjoyed eating, since it didn't taste like cardboard! The almond is my favorite, with the blueberry being my next favorite. Just wish the prices were lower!
customer_reviews.author: judy w

customer_reviews.title: OLD PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: The box I received had a manufacture date of March 2018 and I got them in january 2019. They are sticking to the wrapper and falling apart. Beware.
customer_reviews.author: D. Eilrich

customer_reviews.title: Sent me an expired box
customer_reviews.text: So I love these bars and was so happy to find them online. I ordered August 2020 and the box expired July 2020. Not cool.
customer_reviews.author: kaarina718

customer_reviews.title: These taste delicious and for a great cause. Props to Kristen Bell
customer_reviews.text: These taste delicious and for a great cause. Props to Kristen Bell, Todd Grinnell and the others! It's so nice to see very successful, public personalities give back in such a powerful way!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Talmadge

customer_reviews.title: Very tasty
customer_reviews.text: This is a win-win. I get a very good and healthful snack or meal replacement, and the hungry kids are fed; nobody loses with that.
customer_reviews.author: H C

customer_reviews.title: Love these!!
customer_reviews.text: The flavors are amazing. Everyone in my family loves them!!! What a great way to enjoy a healthy treat, and help feed others!
customer_reviews.author: Jenn Harper

customer_reviews.title: They aren't the same flavor as before.
customer_reviews.text: The recipe has changed from the previous bars that I ordered. I didn't care for these new bars.
customer_reviews.author: tee

customer_reviews.title: Yum
customer_reviews.text: These are delcious! Love that they are full of great ingredients and contribute to a great cause while being so yummy!
customer_reviews.author: Anna S

customer_reviews.title: We eat together
customer_reviews.text: When I got a little hungry today and reached for this snack bar, I started reading the package. As I ate this very delicious flaver combo, I noticed it's Fair Trade ( good), Gluten Free (good), Non GMO, (good), Dairy Free (good), has size friendly almonds (good) and then I read the "We Eat Together " slogan on the package (INCREDIBLE! !!). It immediately reminded me why I originally purchased "THIS BAR SAVES LIVES" ...... for that exact reason. ... knowing I'm giving a meal to a hungry child in addition to enjoying a healthy snack. Somehow it made me smile a bit bigger .
customer_reviews.author: kris

customer_reviews.title: I like the flavor like the taste's.
customer_reviews.text: The flavors I've ever good about 3 since it got here. While this evening lol. I know there are good I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Bar
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these, but they're not always readily available locally. Nice to know I can get them here.
customer_reviews.author: lejoi

customer_reviews.title: A winning situation for all!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the peanut butter chocolate ones because who doesn't like peanut butter and chocolate, am I right? They are SUPER yummy, a little chewy, and not too sweet. I feel good about eating them, and I also feel good that I'm helping feed hungry children by buying them, so it's a winning situation for all!
customer_reviews.author: Danine Pontarelli

customer_reviews.title: Great taste
customer_reviews.text: We love the bars and the fact that there is a worthwhile cause benefitting from our snacking
customer_reviews.author: Carol j

customer_reviews.title: Yummy snack for a pre-teen
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is very picky about granola bars in general... she LOVES this one and that's why we got a subscription on it. Wish there would be more flavors available for subscription, though.
customer_reviews.author: Madeline

customer_reviews.title: Great taste and other benefits!
customer_reviews.text: Great taste, healthy ingredients, and beneficial arrangement with company charity program. Win, win, win.
customer_reviews.author: PKM

customer_reviews.title: I love these
customer_reviews.text: Every flavor is yummy so far. I also love the fact that they are vegan and gluten free!! It's like a snack/guilty pleasure that's still healthy. Packaging is so cute and they're also working for an amazing cause!! Love these bars over Cliff bars and any other not-so-healthy bars. My go to with Macro bars now.
customer_reviews.author: Marion Nadal

customer_reviews.title: BAD BATCH
customer_reviews.text: The last 2 boxes I have received of these have been bad. They taste moldy and I want a refund of the box I just received. This item is none returnable but I feel it is warranted with the last 2 boxes being bad and defective... and gross.
customer_reviews.author: Corrina Marcotte

customer_reviews.title: So Good!!!
customer_reviews.text: I actually had one of these at a trade show and heard their story! The bars are PERFECT for breakfast or snack and such great corporate values! So tasty as well!
customer_reviews.author: swest8868

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: Even my picky kids love these. And they pass the school's 'healthy enough' test for lunch snacks. I also don't mind the higher price as I know the money is going to a good cause.
customer_reviews.author: Self-Made Model

customer_reviews.title: Good tasting
customer_reviews.text: Very good bars. They taste good, they're healthy, and when you buy them, food goes to hungry children.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Roses

customer_reviews.title: Love these - but need COOL shipping option
customer_reviews.text: These are the best oat-free granola bars I have found. Great ingredients. BUT they always come a bit melty. I live in the south. Wish they shipped them with a cold pack. My only complaint.
customer_reviews.author: B or K Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Tasty Treat from a great seller.
customer_reviews.text: Delicious bars. Thank you seller for fast and careful shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Julie A. Delahay

customer_reviews.title: Once you’re out you’ll miss them being available.
customer_reviews.text: Delicious and very satisfying. These have become a household favorite.
customer_reviews.author: ASquires

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and nutritious!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I enjoy these bars very much. We like the variety in the 8-pack. We especially like that with the purchase, a donation is made to help others. I eat them just as they are, or crumbled into some yogurt. Very good!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Kay Bonfante

customer_reviews.title: THIS ~machine~ BAR ~kills~ SAVES ~fascists~ LIVES
customer_reviews.text: I ate two of these bars for four days straight instead of, or to supplement, breakfast & lunch. They are tasty and satiated my hunger. The company donates nutrient packets to malnourished people with a portion of the proceeds; hopefully that's mostly legit. Either way; quite the bar.
customer_reviews.author: Vince Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Good tasting, good for me
customer_reviews.text: This bar saves lives is my breakfast bar of choice hands down. Good tasting, good for me, good for the world, win-win-win. Highly recommend, especially the dark-chocolate cherry almond. Bomb.
customer_reviews.author: Omid Majdi

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Very tasty and great on the go. Wish it was a little cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: briankiz1

customer_reviews.title: Ciclying bar
customer_reviews.text: I love the box finish, I love the flavor and I eat this bars for my daily ciclying commute
customer_reviews.author: hermes

customer_reviews.title: Replace the nutrigrain for this!
customer_reviews.text: Hubbys new breakfast bar! Finally got him off the Nutrigrain bar. this is so much better!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Schmitt

customer_reviews.title: Sweet and airy.
customer_reviews.text: It’s good that they donate some of the price to help people but this bar is definitely on the sweet side for a health bar. It has puffed grains in it and is airy and sticky, with a light crunch. I don’t like it nearly as much as Kind bars.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Sue

customer_reviews.title: Taste Great - Supports a good cause
customer_reviews.text: These were delicious and the added is bonus is supporting a good cause. I have purchased in the past and will do so again in the future. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: City Girl

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Tastes great, melts a little... but I live in Vegas and almost everything melts here in the summer.
customer_reviews.author: Fritzin

customer_reviews.title: Yummy 😋
customer_reviews.text: Light and delicious. Not chalky, heavy or full of calories. Great pick me up in the middle of the day. My daughter loves them as a snack for school, she’ll sometimes have two a day. First bought one at 7 Eleven and couldn’t find it again. Then decided to just purchase it online. Have it on auto delivery.
customer_reviews.author: R Joseph

customer_reviews.title: FINALLY, a moist granola bar that is deliciously perfect 👌!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many granola bars and these are “SIMPLE” the best tasting yet! They are crunchy and moist! And to think this purchase will benefit so many suffering from hunger is an added bonus. The dark chocolate cherry is my favorite but enjoyed all four flavors. Buy them to benefit your health, your palate, and help feed others. Worth every dollar!!! Angela K., Virginia
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: Why does this say 12 bars when they only give you one?? Flavor just ok.
customer_reviews.author: TwinGal

customer_reviews.title: Great Taste
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic tasting bar and will be buying more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: So good!
customer_reviews.text: These are so yummy. They are not bad for you and they also do good. I love how they are both crunchy and chewy. Delish!
customer_reviews.author: BrightJenn13

customer_reviews.title: Great bars
customer_reviews.text: Really good bars for a snack. Received original bars from QVC variety pack. Really like the chocolate peanut butter ones. Able to get just the ones we like from here.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great for you and helps out hungry kids too
customer_reviews.text: I bought an entire box of the Madagascar Vanilla Almond & Honey flavor after trying the variety pack (which I finished in 2 days), and am completely satisfied. This was my favorite flavor - just the right amount of sweetness but not too sweet. It has great texture and holds well together without being too sticky or chewy. I switched to this bar as part of a goal to eat more healthy - it has a lot of fiber and not too much sugar. I use it as a breakfast bar and an afternoon snack bar. Every bar sold goes towards feeding a child in need - this is a great bonus, but first and foremost it tastes great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting!  Reminds me Marshmallow Squares!
customer_reviews.text: I love these. Great for dairy and corn free diets.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa T

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: These bars are so sticky I couldn’t get it out of the wrapper. By the time I cut the wrapper open the bar was broken and smushed. I could put up with all that if the bars tasted good.
customer_reviews.author: Scenicbrook

customer_reviews.title: Great taste, stale on arrival
customer_reviews.text: I love these granola bars. However the ones arrived were not as fresh or soft as when you purchase at a store.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Marie Stempkowski

customer_reviews.title: So Yummy
customer_reviews.text: Heard about these on a Podcast. They taste amazing. Love them and love that the company gives back.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Love these bars!
customer_reviews.text: My husbands new morning snack bar in place of Nutrigrain bars which are nothing but sugar!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Schmitt

customer_reviews.title: Very good bars
customer_reviews.text: I miss the strawberry peanut butter bars they used to have. They reminded me of eating a peanut butter and jelly sandwich. Yum! But these are good too. I love peanut butter so you can't go wrong with it.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl Maxwell

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: Love this bar! Great for snacking on the go. I am in sales, so I’m on the road every day. These are the right amount of sugar and protein to get me over the mid-day hump. And I love their mission!
customer_reviews.author: JMB82

customer_reviews.title: Yummy healthy snacks
customer_reviews.text: These bars are delicious!!each flavors is so good. They are easy to put in your purse or pocket for a quick yummy snack. Also. Money goes to a good cause. I will definitely reorder
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Delicious & Healthy!!
customer_reviews.text: Delicious and Healthy!!! And you can feel Good about Helping Others!!!!
customer_reviews.author: S. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Very tasty bars.
customer_reviews.text: Great flavor, especially since they are so good for you. They make me a little gassy, but seems to subside after I've been eating them for a few days for some reason. Bonus that they help people also.
customer_reviews.author: Nyte

customer_reviews.title: Our favorite bars
customer_reviews.text: These bars are so delicious! Our family loves them. I'm so excited to be able to order them via Amazon. Great product and great mission.
customer_reviews.author: Cole R.
